page.title: 06CLUBS
page.content: {CLUBS}A youth club is a place where young people go to occupy their time.Coggeshall Youth Club is on Thursday evening from 6-30pm to 8-30pm and costs 20p.We play volleyball,basketball and darts.The Brownies,Guides,Cubs and Scouts were all founded by Lord and Lady Baden Powell.Their aim is to help people In Coggeshall there are two packs of Brownies and one pack each of Guides,Cubs and Scouts.The highest award for a Guide is the Queens Award to become a Queens Guide.Cubs have to go for the Queens Scout Award.Adults are catered for in the Conservative Club,a political club, which is licensed for food and drink.There is a childrens room with a pool table and a dart board.In another room there is a twelve foot snooker table.
